updates.contents: Our engineers have resolved the git-push issue. All git-push deploys are now working as expected.
updates.title: Git-push Timeouts on Cedar

updates.contents:
We're currently seeing git-push timeouts for apps on the Cedar stack. Git-pushes to the Bamboo stack are currently working.

Our runtime engineers are fixing the issue now.
updates.title: Git-push Timeouts on Cedar

updates.contents: Our automated systems have detected potential platform errors.  We are investigating.
updates.title: Potential Platform Issues
